author: Anna Iovine
title: Sexting and nudes are on the rise during quarantine
description: "Tomorrow isn't promised, send nudes today." This fake Bible verse — Coronavirus 3:17, naturally — has been making the rounds on Twitter for several weeks, and the reason isn't surprising. The coronavirus pandemic has led to widespread stay-at-home orders, wh…
content:
